Entries.married_Goldenglow: Hello, @, happy wedding to you and Susie! #$e# Well...it's just that there are some vacancies in the store after she left...
Entries.Thu2: Although Miss Susie was a little hesitant when she first came here...but now she is much better and more skilled.
Entries.Fri2: *whisper* Miss Susie once told me that she wanted to open a barber shop in Stardew Valley...#$e# Although she said it was just a casual talk. But Stardew Valley really needs a barber, doesn't it?

Entries.married_Goldenglow: Happy wedding, @! #$e# But after Susie left, I have to be busy again.
Entries.dating_Goldenglow: Hey, I heard you and Susie are together. #$b#@, Susie is a good girl, don't let her down.
